high_descs: turn right, take two steps, turn left to face bed
close the computer that is on the bed, pick computer up
turn around to face the desk
anns.task_desc: examine a computer with a lamp

high_descs: Turn right, walk forward to the heater, then turn left.
Pick up the laptop to the right of the others.
Turn right, walk to the wall, then turn right.
Turn on the lamp on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Pick up the laptop and turn on the lamp.

high_descs: Turn to your right and go to the heat register on the wall, then turn to the bed to your left.
Close and pick up the laptop closest to the wall on the end of the bed.
Turn around so that you are facing the end of the desk.
Turn on the lamp on the corner of the desk.
